name: I Became the Genius Bastard of a Noble Dark Clan
author: Yoo Joo-in &#40유주인&#41
content: After breaking his back working with the Hero&#039s Party, Chris wound up facing a dog&#039s death.&#039Please, let me be born into a wealthy family in my next life…&#039When he next awoke, he was the young master of an immensely wealthy family. However, he wasn&#039t just any noble son but Christian van Baren Kazar—the infamous, good-for-nothing bastard of the Magic Empire&#039s Dark Magic Clan.&quotAaaagh! What the hell?!&quotThere were only two years left until Christian was fated to meet an
